alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 24 at 3:22AM AKST until January 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Freezing rain from Galena south with trace accumulations, is expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with localized amounts up to 10 inches along the Nulato Hills, are expected. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until 9 AM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 25 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Look for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
